text_en: in other words, in Costa Rica there is no opposition to the democratic system but to the way and the content in which it has been made to function.

text: Ia critica no va dirigida a los principios o a las instituciones de Ia democracia representativa, sino a quienes, temporalmente. ejercen el poder en esas instancias.
text_en: The criticism is not directed at the principles or institutions of representative democracy, but at those who temporarily exercise power in those instances.

text: No estamos en presencia de una crisis de Ia democracia, sino de una crisis en Ia democracia.
text_en: We are not in the presence of a crisis of democracy, but of a crisis in democracy.

text: Tampoco enfrentamos un sistema alternativo al democratico, como existio en tiempos casas, mas peligrosa que Ia prevaleciente hacia 30 o 40 anos. del comunismo o el fascismo; sin embargo, Ia situacion no deja de ser riesgosa y, en algunos
text_en: Nor do we face an alternative system to democracy, as existed in the past, more dangerous than the one that prevailed 30 or 40 years ago, that of communism or fascism; nevertheless, the situation is still risky and, in some cases, even more dangerous than in the past.

text: Hoy los enemigos de Ia democracia utilizan las mismas formas institucionales y los mismos lenguajes de los dem6cratas, se ocultan y disfrazan tras los mecanismos electorates y las legislaciones politicas liberates, pero carcomen, desde dentro, las fuentes de legitimidad del sistema, al actuar en funci6n de sus intereses privados y no del bien comun, como corresponde, precisamente, al quehacer democratico.
text_en: Today the enemies of democracy use the same institutional forms and the same languages of the democrats, they hide and disguise themselves behind the electoral mechanisms and liberal political legislations, but they undermine, from within, the sources of legitimacy of the system, acting in function of their private interests and not of the common good, as it corresponds, precisely, to the democratic task.

text: Ahara bien, es clara que nos encontramos en un periodo de transición politica, pero aun resulta ambiguo y poco visible el horizonte hacia el cual se orienta esta transición.
text_en: Now, it is clear that we are in a period of political transition, but the horizon towards which this transition is heading is still ambiguous and unclear.

text: Contribuir a aclararlo y a definir sus derroteros basicos es el propósito de las paginas que siguen.
text_en: The purpose of the following pages is to contribute to clarify it and to define its basic directions.

text: 6.2 Los nuevas desafios
text_en: 6.2 New challenges

text: La democracia se expresa en el arden económico, el arden politico, el arden social y el orden etico/cultural, es, en este sentido, un principio de estructuración de Ia totalidad de Ia vida en sociedad que privilegia Ia libertad personal y Ia capacidad de alcanzar acuerdos entre las distintas fuerzas politicas y sociales que otorguen coherencia, estabilidad y durabilidad a Ia convivencia social.
text_en: Democracy is expressed in the economic order, the political order, the social order and the ethical/cultural order, it is, in this sense, a principle of structuring the totality of life in society that privileges personal freedom and the ability to reach agreements between the different political and social forces that give coherence, stability and durability to social coexistence.

text: En este sentido, Ia democracia no niega el papel positive de las diferencias y los conflictos sociales, pero declara que a traves de esas diferencias y conflictos se realiza Ia complementariedad de las distintas posiciones e intereses.
text_en: In this sense, democracy does not deny the positive role of social differences and conflicts, but declares that it is through these differences and conflicts that the complementarity of different positions and interests is realized.

text: De este modo se postula que Ia sociedad es en esencia plural.
text_en: Thus it is postulated that society is in essence plural.

text: Para Ia democracia el caracter plural de Ia realidad social determina Ia necesidad etica del pluralismo politico/ideológico.
text_en: For democracy, the plural character of social reality determines the ethical necessity of political/ideological pluralism.

text: La naturaleza plural de Ia sociedad y el principia del pluralismo, dan Iugar a Ia existencia de disenos institucionales a traves del cual se busca el acuerdo y Ia sintesis entre diversas fuerzas políticas y sociales.
text_en: The plural nature of society and the principle of pluralism give rise to the existence of institutional designs through which agreement and synthesis among diverse political and social forces are sought.

text: Es esta Ia razón par Ia cual nace Ia doctrina de Ia division de poderes y de frenos y contrapesos,

text: Este es un tema del cual se viene hablando desde hace varios afios; ciertamente, no existe consenso en torno a Ia conveniencia o no de convocar a una Asamblea Nacional Constituyente.
text_en: This is an issue that has been discussed for several years; certainly, there is no consensus on whether or not to convene a National Constituent Assembly.

text: Para algunos Ia Constitucion actual puede mejorarse a traves de las reformas parciales, para otros Ia posibilidad de una convocatoria, en las condiciones actuales, amenaza con una composicion politica e ideologica de Ia Asamblea Constituyente ajena, en el fonda, a los principios y valores de Ia convivencia democratica.
text_en: For some the current Constitution can be improved through partial reforms, for others the possibility of a convocation, under the current conditions, threatens with a political and ideological composition of the Constituent Assembly foreign, in the background, to the principles and values of democratic coexistence.

text: Respecto a estas reservas cabe plantear lo siguiente: • El expediente de las reformas parciales, utilizado de modo abundante, ha conducido a introducir parches en el actual texto constitucional y, par esa via, a enmarafiar el funcionamiento del Estado y Ia sociedad.
text_en: With respect to these reservations, the following should be raised: - The expedient of partial reforms, used abundantly, has led to introduce patches in the current constitutional text and, by that way, to alter the functioning of the State and society.

text: Las reformas parciales, ademas, comunmente no responden a una vision integral de Ia sociedad costarricense, sino mas bien a segmentos sociales e institucionales especificos, con Ia cual el texto constitucional tiende a perder su caracter de norma superior del ordenamiento juridico y contexte legal mayor de Ia vida social y econ6mica del pais.
text_en: Partial reforms, moreover, do not usually respond to an integral vision of Costa Rican society, but rather to specific social and institutional segments, with which the constitutional text tends to lose its character of superior norm of the legal system and major legal context of the social and economic life of the country.

text: En cuanto a Ia posibilidad de una composici6n antidemocratica de Ia Asamblea Nacional Constituyente, creo que no existen condiciones para que tal cosa sea una realidad.

text: La inmensa mayoria de los partidos politicos son democraticos, Ia ciudadania ha manifestado, de modo reiterado, su identificacion con las instituciones de Ia democracia liberal y del Estado Social de Derecho,
text_en: The vast majority of political parties are democratic, the citizenry has repeatedly expressed its identification with the institutions of liberal democracy and the social rule of law,

text: incluso entre los ciudadanos independientes y las organizaciones de Ia sociedad civil, el apego a los principios y valores de Ia democracia es ampliamente mayoritario.
text_en: even among independent citizens and civil society organizations, the attachment to the principles and values of democracy is widely majority.

text: Asi las casas, ni en el cuerpo electoral, ni en los partidos politicos ni en Ia sociedad civil existe posibilidad alguna de seleccionar una Asamblea Constituyente contraria al ideario democratico.
text_en: Thus, neither in the electoral body, nor in the political parties nor in civil society is there any possibility of selecting a Constituent Assembly contrary to the democratic ideology.

text: Estimo, en consecuencia, que los temores razonables, par supuesto, de quienes se oponen a Ia posibilidad de convocar una Asamblea Nacional Constituyente, pueden deponerse a fin de concentrar Ia reflexion en torno a las causas que justifican un nuevo texto constitucional y sus eventuales contenidos.
text_en: I believe, therefore, that the reasonable fears, of course, of those who oppose the possibility of convening a National Constituent Assembly, can be put aside in order to concentrate the reflection on the causes that justify a new constitutional text and its possible contents.

text: En cuanto a las causas par las cuales estimo necesario ejecutar esta iniciativa y abocar al pais a una reforma integral de Ia Constitucion Politica, menciono las siguientes:
text_en: As to the reasons for which I consider it necessary to execute this initiative and lead the country to a comprehensive reform of the Political Constitution, I mention the following:

text: Existe un amplio consenso en torno a Ia caducidad y desfase de que padece nuestro sistema politico/institucional, como dije con anterioridad, los costarricenses se identifican de modo amplio con el ideario democratico, pero critican y se alejan de quienes temporalmente ejercen Ia autoridad y del funcionamiento administrative, organizacional, de las instituciones estatales.
text_en: As I said before, Costa Ricans identify themselves broadly with the democratic ideology, but criticize and distance themselves from those who temporarily exercise authority and the administrative, organizational functioning of state institutions.

text: ¿Porque no pasar de ese consenso y sentido crítico de Ia población a una Asamblea Constituyente que encare el rete de reformar en su conjunto el texto constitucional?

text: El abuse de este mecanisme ha conducido a deformar el sentido originario de una Constitución Politica.
text_en: The abuse of this mechanism has led to the deformation of the original meaning of a Political Constitution.

text_en: I wonder if a National Constituent Assembly is not a fundamental deliberative space in which to build, in a pluralistic and democratic way, this strategic development north, simultaneously translating it into a constitutional level regulation?

text_en: Much is discussed about the principles and values of democratic society, is not the National Constituent Assembly the space to reaffirm and enrich them according to the contemporary characteristics of social development, both in Costa Rica and in the world?

text_en: Specifically, I consider it necessary to sustain, in the superior normative plane of the Political Constitution, that the State and the Costa Rican society move away, by principle, from both statism and economism,

text_en: we believe in a coordination, not dogmatic or ideological, but pragmatic, of the State and the economy, where the principle of subsidiarity prevails, according to which the State does not intervene in those matters that can be better solved by the intermediate instances of society or by the people, considered individually.

text: ¿Que otros rasgos basicos conviene perfilar en el nuevo texto constitucional? Sugiero algunos a fin de contribuir a Ia reflexión sabre este lema tan decisive en Ia Costa Rica moderna:
text_en: What other basic features should be outlined in the new constitutional text? I suggest some in order to contribute to the reflection on this motto so decisive in modern Costa Rica:

text: Decalogo Social Cristiano
text_en: Christian Social Decalogue

text: Todo partido doctrinario ha de sustentarse en principios y conceptos que rigen el quehacer politico y que constituyen el fundamento de su accion.
text_en: Every doctrinaire party must be based on principles and concepts that govern political activities and constitute the foundation of its actions.

text: Seguidamente presentamos al electorado seis principios y otros tantos conceptos que son el sustento de nuestra accion politica, derivados del documento ideologico aprobado con el nombre de "Carta Socialcristiana a Costa Rica".
text_en: Next we present to the electorate six principles and other concepts that are the basis of our political action, derived from the ideological document approved under the name of "Social-Christian Charter for Costa Rica".

text: Nuestros principios Fundamentales
text_en: Our Fundamental Principles

text: 1.- El humanismo cristiano como inspiraci6n
text_en: 1.- Christian humanism as inspiration

text: Consideramos que los principios humanos del cristianismo constituyen un Patrimonio universal, aplicado a hombres y mujeres sin distingo de credo religioso, interpretado con un carácter dinamico y adaptado a las nuevas realidades.
text_en: We consider that the human principles of Christianity constitute a universal heritage, applied to men and women without distinction of religious creed, interpreted with a dynamic character and adapted to new realities.

text: Par eso hablamos del socialcristianismo ya que tomamos los conceptos cristianos aplicados a Ia realidad social del presente, tales como las enciclicas papales y el pensamiento de muchos autores que han tornado lo mejor del pensamiento cristiano para llevarlo a Ia practica social.
text_en: For this reason we speak of social Christianity since we take Christian concepts applied to the social reality of the present, such as the papal encyclicals and the thought of many authors who have turned the best of Christian thought to take it to social practice.

text: 2.- La persona como sujeto integral de Ia acción gobierno
text_en: The person as an integral subject of government action

text: Todo ser humano como persona, tiene una serie de derechos inherentes a tal condicion como Ia dignidad humana y Ia inviolabilidad de Ia vida.
text_en: Every human being as a person has a series of rights inherent to such condition as human dignity and inviolability of life.

text: Cada persona es una, irreductible y singular, capaz de tamar decisiones morales y con plena libertad para Ia realizacion personal y Ia convivencia humana.
text_en: Each person is one, irreducible and singular, capable of making moral decisions and with full freedom for personal fulfillment and human coexistence.

text: Pero no solo tiene derechos inalienables, sino tambien deberes y responsabilidad plena para tamar decisiones ante si mismo y ante Ia sociedad.
text_en: But he has not only inalienable rights, but also duties and full responsibility to make decisions before himself and before society.

text: Ningun ser humano puede atribuirse Ia posesion de Ia verdad en forma absoluta, sino racionalizar sus aetas y ejercitar Ia tolerancia como una forma de aceptar las ideas de los demas, en vez de Ia imposicion ideologica.
text_en: No human being can attribute to himself the possession of the truth in absolute form, but to rationalize his aetas and to exercise tolerance as a form of accepting the ideas of the others, instead of the ideological imposition.

text: 3.- La libertad y Ia igualdad.
text_en: 3.- Freedom and equality.

text: Ambos constituyen derechos humanos para que el individuo aprovechando Ia condicion de libertad y disfrute de Ia igualdad, pueda ser dueiio de su propio destine.
text_en: Both constitute human rights so that the individual, taking advantage of the condition of freedom and enjoyment of equality, can be master of his own destiny.

text: Sin embargo no hablamos aqui de una independencia absoluta porque existen limites fijados por el derecho, las normas de convivencia y de seguro, aquellos que pertenecen a Ia libertad de los otros miembros del conglomerado social.
text_en: However, we do not speak here of absolute independence because there are limits set by law, the rules of coexistence and, of course, those that belong to the freedom of the other members of the social conglomerate.

text: Mas bien, Ia accion politica ha de ser garante de Ia libertad y Ia igualdad para que el ser humane se desarrolle en condiciones dignas.
text_en: Rather, political action must be the guarantor of freedom and equality so that human beings can develop in dignified conditions.

text: La libertad individual conduce a Ia igualdad de derechos y oportunidades para hombres y mujeres.
text_en: Individual freedom leads to equality of rights and opportunities for men and women.

text: 4.- La solidaridad y Ia acción subsidiaria
text_en: Solidarity and subsidiary action

text: Cada persona debe aceptar sus responsabilidades consigo mismo y hacia los miembros de su familia, pero tambien debe contribuir con su esfuerzo al servicios de Ia comunidad y de sus otros semejantes.
text_en: Each person must accept his responsibilities towards himself and towards the members of his family, but he must also contribute with his efforts to the services of the community and of his fellow men.

text: lndudablemente, Ia sociedad progresa par el apoyo solidario entre sus miembros. Cada uno debe trabajar para su propio beneficia pero apoyando acciones en beneficia de sus semejantes y de toda Ia sociedad en general.
text_en: Undoubtedly, society progresses by solidarity support among its members. Each one must work for his own benefit but support actions for the benefit of his fellow men and of the whole society in general.

text: Y alli donde Ia accion personal y social se vea imposibilitada en virtud de Ia extension o complejidad de un proceso de demanda social, el Estado, acudiendo al concepto de subsidiaridad, interviene para darle solucion y satisfacer asi una determinada necesidad.
text_en: And wherever personal and social action is impossible due to the extension or complexity of a social demand process, the State, resorting to the concept of subsidiarity, intervenes to provide a solution and thus satisfy a given need.

text: 5.- Justicia y equidad
text_en: Justice and equity

text: La justicia consiste en atribuir a cada uno lo que le corresponde de acuerdo al marco legal, pero el sentido de equidad lleva a dar a cada uno segun su necesidad.
text_en: Justice consists of attributing to each one what corresponds to him according to the legal framework, but the sense of equity leads to give to each one according to his need.

text: Obviamente, hay muchas casas justas par su apego a Ia ley, pero inequitativas par cuanto favorecen mas a unos que a los otros.
text_en: Obviously, there are many houses that are fair in their adherence to the law, but inequitable in that they favor some more than others.

text: Asi, debe haber un reconocimiento de acuerdo al rendimiento o logros personates, par un lado, pero par otro, muchos casas ameritan compensacion social en Ia busqueda de Ia equidad.
text_en: Thus, there should be recognition according to performance or personal achievements, on the one hand, but on the other, many homes deserve social compensation in the search for equity.

text: Tambien, Ia justicia no puede ser Ia voluntad de Ia mayoria en perjuicio de las minorias, en el libre ejercicio de sus derechos.
text_en: Also, justice cannot be the will of the majority to the detriment of the minorities, in the free exercise of their rights.

text: La equidad indica apoyar a quienes mas necesitan o evitar que las personas vivan por debajo de un minima nivel de dignidad.
text_en: Equity indicates supporting those most in need or preventing people from living below a minimum level of dignity.

text: Par tanto debemos ser tanto justos como equitativos.
text_en: Therefore we must be both fair and equitable.

text: 6.- La democracia participativa
text_en: Participatory democracy

text: En Ia democracia, el sistema politico toma el poder par un mandata dado por el mismo pueblo, en Ia seguridad de que se gobierna en beneficia del pueblo.
text_en: In democracy, the political system takes power by a mandate given by the people themselves, in the certainty that it governs for the benefit of the people.

text: Aunque imperfecta, Ia democracia es Ia mejor alternativa en el tanto permita Ia participacion popular.
text_en: Although imperfect, democracy is the best alternative as long as it allows popular participation.

text: Asi, los ciudadanos han de estar involucrados en Ia forma de circulos concentricos en los que Ia toma de decisiones va extendiendose desde el nivel de barrio, distrito, canton, provincia, region del pais o hacia Ia comunidad internacional.
text_en: Thus, citizens must be involved in the form of concentric circles in which decision making is extended from the level of neighborhood, district, canton, province, region of the country or towards the international community.

text: El gobierno democratico se ejerce como delegacion de los votantes, pero Ia participacion popular cuenta con mecanismos de participacion como Ia rendicion de cuentas, el cabildo abierto, el referendum, el plebiscita y las elecciones locales.
text_en: The democratic government is exercised as a delegation of the voters, but popular participation has participation mechanisms such as accountability, open town hall, referendum, plebiscite and local elections.

text: 7.- Los principios eticos del ejercicio publico
text_en: 7.- Ethical principles of public practice

text: El servidor publico, desde el presidente hasta el nivel mas sencillo, se debe al pueblo.
text_en: The public servant, from the president down to the lowest level, owes it to the people.

text: Par tanto, es una real amenaza quien utiliza el poder en beneficia propio o de un grupo, lo que podriamos llamar corrupcion activa.
text_en: Therefore, a real threat is the one who uses power to benefit himself or a group, what we could call active corruption.

text: Pero tambien existen casas de corrupcion pasiva caracterizada par Ia inaccion o incapacidad para ejercer con propiedad un cargo.
text_en: But there are also houses of passive corruption characterized by inaction or inability to properly exercise an office.

text: Los procesos realizados de forma cristalina y una eficiente rendici6n de cuentas son medidas que alejan a personas e instituciones del mal endemico de Ia corrupción.
text_en: Crystal-clear processes and efficient accountability are measures that keep people and institutions away from the endemic evil of corruption.

text: AI igual que el cuidado de Ia salud fisica, Ia salud espiritual de los gobernantes y funcionarios de gobierno, debe tener acciones concretas de promoción, prevención, tratamiento y castigo de actos ilegales o reñidos con Ia etica y ligados a Ia corrupción.
text_en: Just as the care of physical health, the spiritual health of rulers and government officials must have concrete actions for the promotion, prevention, treatment and punishment of illegal or unethical acts linked to corruption.

text: La ideologia del PUSC va mas alia del servidor publico y como un manual de buenas practicas de comportamiento social, los principios eticos deben alcanzar a todos los ciudadanos y en Ia gran diversidad de sus manifestaciones.
text_en: The ideology of the PUSC goes beyond the public servant and as a manual of good practices of social behavior, the ethical principles must reach all citizens and in the great diversity of its manifestations.

text: La democracia se fortalece en Ia medida en que los funcionarios sigan un código de etica basado en principios, procesos cristalinos, Ia denuncia y el castigo.
text_en: Democracy is strengthened to the extent that officials follow a code of ethics based on principles, clear processes, denunciation and punishment.

text: Estructura funcional del Estado Costarricense
text_en: Functional Structure of the Costa Rican State

text: Par lo menos desde hace 25 alios se viene hablando de Ia reforma del estado costarricense y ha venido avanzando a un ritmo Iento cuando los imperatives del momenta exigen acciones prontas.
text_en: For at least 25 years there has been talk of reforming the Costa Rican state and it has been advancing at a pace when the imperatives of the moment demand prompt action.

text: Par lo demas, esto no es nada nuevo.
text_en: For the rest, this is nothing new.

text_en: Countries, governments, their institutions, companies and even individuals themselves not only change under the constraints of time and space, but also remain marginalized from global megatrends if they fail to do so.

text_en: Unfinished reform

text_en: Perhaps we have been too critical, but in terms of education and health, there are very valuable results such as the increase in average schooling, improvement in secondary school enrollment in

text: Administración con liderazgo
text_en: Administration with leadership

text: Cabe pensar que se requiere un planteamiento estrategico para reformar el Estado y definir las competencias estrategicas, porque el estado no puede hacer de todo.
text_en: It is worth thinking that a strategic approach is required to reform the State and define strategic competencies, because the State cannot do everything.

text: Y en segundo Iugar, buena parte de su funcion es Ia promocion individual y social en materia productiva.
text_en: And secondly, a large part of its function is individual and social promotion in productive matters.

text: Definidas ya las competencias estrategicas, se requiere ahara Ia busqueda de las personas, lo que llamariamos los competentes estrategicos, lo cual nos lleva a otro asunto.
text_en: Once the strategic competencies have been defined, it is now necessary to look for people, what we would call strategic competencies, which brings us to another issue.

text: Para gobernar se requiere Ia adecuada capacitacion tecnica y Ia experiencia, par cuanto los aetas de Ia alta administraciín publica se pagan caros cuando son errados.
text_en: To govern requires adequate technical training and experience, since the goals of high public administration are expensive when they are wrong.

text: Debemos recurrir a los principios de las buenas practicas administrativas, tales como el establecimiento de los objetivos, metas y procedimientos de acuerdo a Ia mision y a Ia vision institucional, de acuerdo a las disposiciones de nuestra constitucion y las leyes.
text_en: We must resort to the principles of good administrative practices, such as the establishment of objectives, goals and procedures according to the institutional mission and vision, in accordance with the provisions of our constitution and laws.

text: Asi, los procesos de evaluacion de proyectos, rendicion de cuentas, Ia cultura de Ia eficiencia y Ia administracion par valores deben incorporarse como requisites en todos los jerarcas.
text_en: Thus, the processes of project evaluation, accountability, efficiency culture and value-based management should be incorporated as requirements for all managers.

text: Cuando no se administra con sapiencia y experiencia, caemos en el extrema de Ia ocurrencia y Ia providencia.
text_en: When it is not managed with wisdom and experience, we fall into the extreme of occurrence and providence.

text: No podemos cejar en nuestro empeno de buscar y formar lideres para el cambia.
text_en: We cannot relent in our quest to seek and train leaders for change.

text: La dignidad humana y Ia inclusion social:
text_en: Human dignity and social inclusion:

text: Algunas cuestiones practicas, tal como Ia lucha contra Ia pobreza, hoy llamada inclusion social tiene el peligro que podemos estarle cambiando nombre y seguir igual.
text_en: Some practical issues, such as the fight against poverty, today called social inclusion, have the danger that we may be changing its name and remain the same.

text: Para nosotros como socialcristianos Ia inclusion social deriva del principia de Ia dignidad humana, pues el solo hecho de ser persona le da derecho a una seguridad humana integral que incorpora acciones de apoyo estatal para superar su estado transitorio de pobreza.
text_en: For us as social Christians, social inclusion derives from the principle of human dignity, since the mere fact of being a person gives him/her the right to integral human security that incorporates state support actions to overcome his/her transitory state of poverty.

text: Los recursos que el estado asigna en materia social son cuantiosos, pero se manejan con ineficiencia y los programas no han mostrado eficacia.
text_en: The resources that the state allocates to social issues are substantial, but they are managed inefficiently and the programs have not proven to be effective.

text: Fortalecimiento para Ia competitividad: Se debate ahara en foros publicos y en las calles sabre Ia apertura del ICE y el INS, materia odiosa par sus multiples puntas de vista, pero debemos fortalecer esas instituciones para que en un mundo competitive puedan mantener su liderazgo.
text_en: Strengthening for competitiveness: There is debate in public forums and in the streets about the opening of ICE and INS, an odious subject for its multiple points of view, but we must strengthen these institutions so that in a competitive world they can maintain their leadership.

text_en: This is a valuable opportunity to increase the human capital of Costa Ricans, give scope to innovation and strengthen technology-based companies, i.e., those that see world-class competitiveness as their daily mission.

text_en: It is necessary to visualize the Youth Sector as a transversal axis of Costa Rica's economic and social development, actively linked to the different sectors and as a model promoter of development.

text_en: Fundamental elements of the historical development of our country must be rescued, the investment in human capital which propitiated a mechanism of upward social mobility and the capacity to achieve national agreements.

text_en: The aging process of the population, the low birth rate and the increase in life expectancy, allow us to foresee an increase in the demand for services especially directed to the elderly in fields such as: education, health, housing and social security.

text: Personas con discapacidad:

text_en: Not all people with disabilities, due to the limitations generated by the environment, reach the same standard of living, however in Costa Rica we must fight for this group to be as independent as possible

text: y ademas porque sean respetados sus derechos humanos.
text_en: and also for their human rights to be respected.

text: En el acceso a Ia cultura, a Ia religion, al deporte, Ia politica y el mercado laboral hay un rezago de Ia poblacion con discapacidad de los cantones rurales.
text_en: In the access to culture, religion, sports, politics and the labor market there is a lag of the disabled population in rural cantons.

text_en: Services are concentrated in the GAM, this must change.

text_en: In the treatment of persons with disabilities, their status as consumers and citizens should take precedence over their status as patients.

text: Como reto permanente: • Velar par el cumplimiento de Ia ley 7600 y evitar cualquier acto que resulte excluyente o discriminatorio hacia Ia poblacion con discapacidad,
text_en: As a permanent challenge: -To ensure compliance with Law 7600 and avoid any act that excludes or discriminates against the population with disabilities,

text_en: - To assist the families of people with disabilities who require permanent support in the care of these members.

text: Población indigena:

text: La identidad cultural de Ia poblacion indigena, su vision del mundo, su forma de organizacion social, sus practicas culturales, religiosas, espirituales y sus valores, nos dejan clara que no podemos creer que nuestras necesidades son iguales a las de elias.
text_en: The cultural identity of the indigenous population, their vision of the world, their form of social organization, their cultural, religious and spiritual practices and their values, make it clear that we cannot believe that our needs are the same as those of Elias.

text_en: They deserve respect and recognition, so we must incorporate the active participation of the indigenous population in the solution of their problems, applying to them the current legislation that recognizes the rights of indigenous peoples, territorial and possession rights.

text: El gobierno debe: • Defender y proteger los recursos naturales y ambientales de las posesiones indigenas.
text_en: The government must: - Defend and protect the natural and environmental resources of the indigenous possessions.

text: • Reducir Ia brecha en salud, educacion e infraestructura existente entre estes pueblos el resto del pais.
text_en: - Reduce the gap in health, education and infrastructure between these peoples and the rest of the country.

text: Población migrante:
text_en: Migrant population:

text: No cabe duda que gracias a las condiciones ventajosas que ofrece Costa Rica con su paz, su relativa estabilidad, tanto social como econ6mica. Resulta en un destine atractivo para quienes buscan las oportunidades de trabajo y Ia tranquilidad que no pueden encontrar en su propio pais.
text_en: There is no doubt that thanks to the advantageous conditions that Costa Rica offers with its peace, its relative stability, both social and economic. It is an attractive destination for those who are looking for job opportunities and tranquility that they cannot find in their own country.

text: La migración tiene que normarse, su crecimiento desproporcionado esta afectando todos los servicios publicos, de salud, vivienda, educación y otros.
text_en: Migration has to be regulated, its disproportionate growth is affecting all public services, health, housing, education and others.

text: Gran parte de esta población migrante se encuentra de forma irregular, no paga impuestos, no se encuentra inscritos en Ia Caja, son explotados par sus patronos.
text_en: A large part of this migrant population is in an irregular situation, they do not pay taxes, are not registered with the Caja, and are exploited by their employers.

text: Debemos ponerlos a derecho, permitiendo el ingreso solo de aquellos que vengan a contribuir con el crecimiento del pais.
text_en: We must bring them into line, allowing the entry only of those who come to contribute to the growth of the country.

text: Las siguientes son acciones necesarias a implementar en el corte plaza: • Aplicar Ia nueva ley de migracion en todos sus alcances.
text_en: The following are necessary actions to be implemented in the plaza court: - Apply the new migration law in all its scope.

text: • Mejorar Ia condición de vida de Ia población migrante.
text_en: - Improve the living conditions of the migrant population.

text: • Dotar con los recursos necesarios a las instituciones encargadas del control y fiscalización de los flujos migratorios.
text_en: - To provide the necessary resources to the institutions in charge of the control and inspection of migratory flows.

text: • Garantizar condiciones laborales y de remuneración en igualdad con los nacionales con los mismos derechos y obligaciones.
text_en: - Guarantee working conditions and remuneration in equality with nationals with the same rights and obligations.
